snippet.title: DAEMON X MACHINA - Official Game Trailer - Nintendo E3 2018
snippet.description:
A brand-new, fast-paced mech action game from Kenichiro Tsukuda is coming to Nintendo Switch. Take your Arsenal, a fully customizable powered suit, out for an array of missions to surmount the enemy at all costs. Coming in 2019.

Follow Nintendo E3 Coverage! http://e3.nintendo.com

#NintendoSwitch #DAEMONXMACHINA #E32018

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com
